/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. Cars can be seen driving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
